item.description:
Hey Folks!

We're very excited to have our very own Rhiannon McHugh as our speaker this month!

Topic: Business Development & Strategy

Main Points:

-Creating a Simple Business Plan

-Developing and Understanding a S.W.O.T. Analysis

-Creating Business Goals and How to Achieve Them

-Understanding Process, Workflow and Time Mangement

 

Speaker Bio:  Rhiannon McHugh

Rhiannon McHugh is a Co-Founder and partner at Do Something Different Media. She specializes in creative media services, project management and brand development. She is also a family, portrait, couples, and event (wedding) photographer and videographer for DSD Media Studios.  For the past 5 years Rhiannon and her husband, Peter, have been organizing and running the New England REIA.

Rhiannon graduated from Plymouth State University with a B.A. in English with minors in teaching and media studies.  Upon graduating in 2008, Rhiannon and her husband founded DSD Media and have continued to grow their business by working with companies to enhance their media and brand strength.

 

Hope you're as excited as we are!  See you on the 6th!

 


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door


Ask about getting YOUR membership today!

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Business Development & Strategy - 3/6/13
